extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the serial number present on the machine for QuickTime Pro.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.apple.QuickTime.plist" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.apple.QuickTime "Pro Key" | grep Registration | awk '{print $4}' | sed 's/\"//g' | sed 's/;//g'` fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
